name: CABAL
startIntroPart1:
<timestream distortion fading>
<chronology stabilizing>
<Adjusted date:4000 BC>
The timeshift has worked! You have escaped from the clutches of time, and
startIntroPart2: Now that you command the past, the world is yours to conquer!
declaringWar: You have been marked for termination.
attacked: I tire of your insignificant defiance.
defeated: I have collected enough data. You may return to your lives. For now.
introduction: Behold, mortal, for I am as a god.
afterPeace: Very well, I shall collate the data from this conflict.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
